title: Assign Referees to Games
description: A league administrator needs to assign referees to all games for the upcoming week, ensuring no conflicts of interest.

tasks.description: Retrieve the list of all games for the upcoming week and the list of all available referees.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent has the schedule and the list of officials.

tasks.description: Automatically assign referees to games based on their experience level, location, and avoiding any conflicts of interest (e.g., assigning a referee to their hometown team's game).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent generates a full, conflict-free assignment list.

tasks.description: Publish the assignments and notify each referee of their schedule for the week.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finalizes the assignments and sends out notifications.
